website_summaries.verdict: A soothing blend of eight essential oils that will ease your headache and refresh you with its invigorating scent.
pros: Users enjoy its unique, relaxing scent
Lasts a long time when used with a carrier oil
Suitable for use in a diffuser
cons: If you don't enjoy the scent of mint, you may find this to be too strong

customer_reviews.title: I bought This for my mom who has intense migraines ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought This for my mom who has intense migraines to the point she has started seeing a specialist because she can no longer deal with the pain. The specialist gave her some medication that wasn’t working that well. She put this on her temples and the location of the migraine and she said within minutes she was able to get out of bed and open her eyes. She wants me to buy her a bigger version but she lives by it now
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Migraine sufferer’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing! It helps me with headaches and migraines. I put it on my forehead, temples and pulse points on my neck and arms. It helps decrease the intensity of migraines. (I do take ibuprofen if the pain is bad enough, but the oil definitely makes a difference, and fast). Doesn’t irritate my skin. I keep a bottle at home, one in my purse and another at the office. I have tried the migrastick in the past, and didn’t find it very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for myself, my mom has cancer and rheumatoid arthritis and already takes tons of medicine and didn't want to add ONE MORE PILL for all her headaches. This purchase has truly helped her calm down if anything. It doesn't take the pain away immediately but it helps slowly relieve it or at least numbs it a little. After rubbing it on her temples she put some in her hands and just sits and inhales them for about a minute. Thank you for the alternative rather than more medicine..
customer_reviews.author: Adriana SR Clark

customer_reviews.title: Head Relief Essential Oil Blend - Ahhhhmazing!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blend! I use this at work in a small diffuser. I only use a couple of drops, but that is perfect for my cube area while not affecting/offending those around me. I cannot say enough how wonderful this blend is. I am generally not a fan of lavender (I know, I know, everyone loves it...) but I know it's a good one for headache relief, so I thought with the mix of other scents it might not be the worst. It does not stand out to me - whew. Again, I LOVE this blend! I primarily smell the mints, but they don't overwhelm the rest. (Lavender, Peppermint, Wintergreen, Basil, Frankincense, Rosemary, Sweet Marjoram, Sweet Orange)
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bartleby

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I get all sorts of headaches, including ocular migraines. I even get headaches sometimes from barometric pressure, and tension headaches. This oil works like magic for me. If the pain is severe it may not completely take the pain away, but it really does help immensely. I love the smell of it too. Even the men in my family use it if they have a headache. In the past year, since I've discovered it, I have bought several bottles. A+ product. (And no, I don't get any compensation for saying any of this)
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this product, I had a really bad headache. I put some on my temples and smelled it for a few seconds. Within a short while, maybe five minutes, my headache lessened to a more manageable pain. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gazley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me, but it might for you
customer_reviews.text: As aromatherapy, I didn’t find this scent mixture to be very pleasant. I also didn’t experience much therapeutic benefit from it either. However, the quality of the oil seems to be pretty good—hence the 3 stars. This product may work well for other headache/migraine victims, but it didn’t for me. I have severe chronic migraines that are usually intractable, so I wasn’t expecting a whole lot, but I was willing to try. I gave some to a relative that also gets migraines, but I haven’t heard from her about it’s effectiveness. I’m going to guess it didn’t do much for her either or else she would have undoubtably asked me where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: My coworkers beg to use some because it helps so much and smells good. Our high stress work environment gives most of ...
customer_reviews.text: This works so well for my head aches! My coworkers beg to use some because it helps so much and smells good. Our high stress work environment gives most of us head aches. I used to buy the more expensive M-grain from a different company till I found Helathy somutions. I will never go back to breaking my bank on that other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: Helps my migraines!
customer_reviews.text: Diffusing this oil is nice and soothing when I have a migraine. The peppermint smell is especially nice if I’m nauseated. This oil blend works just as well as the extremely overpriced one from Young Living! Also this company has excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE NEW BOTTLES!!
customer_reviews.text: This new packaging in plastic without the dropper top is awful! VERY DISSATISFIED with this new bottle! I’ve been a long time loyal customer & huge supporter of these oils. Loved all my essential oils from here, however the new plastic bottle & wide open top is just cheap manufacturing. I absolutely would never recommend this type of packaging for essential oils. Go back to your original glass bottles with the drop pourer top!
customer_reviews.author: J&B

customer_reviews.title: It minimizes sinus headache
customer_reviews.text: Smells great!!! But more importantly, and oddly, it works! With terrible sinus headaches in this Charlotte allergy pool, we love so much, this helps!! For 3 months I wake up with a terrible headache, eye and face pain. So, my morning routine is; Allegra-D, DOUBLE strength caffeine espresso, 2-3 ibuprofen or ES Tylenol and I get relief for 5 hours! I use the oil all over my head 3-4x a day and it prevents the cocktail of medications again at 3pm. It minimizes the headache!
customer_reviews.author: Go2Happy

customer_reviews.title: Not the same brand
customer_reviews.text: Not the genuine oil blend - I’ve bought this blend twice before and it’s been great from other suppliers. This time it’s clearly been repackaged in a plastic bottle with a printed label slapped on. The print is even blurred on the label. The smell is off, not genuine oils like the original blend. Smells slightly burnt - not a good smell. The seller “Prime Time Commerce” is distributing a rip off. It’s a shame when this happens. Makes me lose faith in Amazon altogether.
customer_reviews.author: JessMomRN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff literally makes my headaches go away in seconds. I put some on my fingers and place it on my temples, forehead, and back of my neck. GONE. Works fast and good, I keep one in my car and one in the house. I might order another for my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Headache relief Oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this head relief oil! The scent and tingling sensation is exactly what I need when I get pounding headaches. It give me instant comfort and helps me go to sleep to ward off my headache. This reminds me of White Flower oil (chinese brand) I am so happy I came across this on Amazon. I will definitely will purchase more to keep in my purse, work backpack, bed side table, and at work. It helps me get through traffic when I have a bad headache.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Helps take the edge off
customer_reviews.text: While it's not a miracle worker for migraines it does help take the edge off. It's a tad on the sweet side which is weird cause you'd think the mint would take over. Maybe a couple more drops of lavender would be nice? I just put it in the diffuser in my night stand and try to breathe deeply. My husband hasn't complained so that's good!
customer_reviews.author: SAHMof2

customer_reviews.title: great for headaches and migraines
customer_reviews.text: I am suffer from migraines and this is great for when I feel a headache/migraine coming on, sometimes it can help either reduce the it or the symptoms of it. It doesnt completely remove or stop heacaches but its helpful. I have repurchased this to have one at the office and one at home with me. I would highly recommend this to anyone that suffers from regular headaches or migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Nef

customer_reviews.title: Great for my headaches, neck and shoulder pain! Very stong, so best to dilute it!!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well not only for my headaches, but also for neck and shoulder pain as well! I received this bottle, my 2nd, I could smell it when I opened the box. The seal on the lid was broken and some of it leaked out into the plastic bag it was in. At 1st, I thought I would just keep it, but in light of all the crazy stuff going on in this world, I'll return it, reorder and hope it doesn't happen again!
customer_reviews.author: 09Nana

customer_reviews.title: Soothing scent
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from headaches nearly everyday, and while I can't proclaim that this makes my headaches go away, it is one of the most soothing/therapeutic scents I have used in my diffuser. It it very relaxing, and seems to alleviate the tension that i experience with headaches.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my diffuser at work and always get compliments on how it smells. Of course it doesn't get rid of migraines, but it's a nice scent that makes me feel a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: The Golden Darter

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I get headaches frequently and I am trying to reduce the amount of OTC medication I take. I've have a roll on applicator so I can put the oil directly on my head but I also use it in a diffuser. This is strong but I love the smell of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my headaches!  Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a year. I have headaches often and this oil is a life saver for me!!! This is my 3rd bottle! Won't go without it!!!! Thank you.. Recommended! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for headaches
customer_reviews.text: Two out of my 3 kids have gotten some kind of bug that causes coughing fits for a week or more. I've given them combo meds of Benadryl with Phenergan dm liquid, or Benadryl with robitussin ac liquid, or Benadryl with mucinex dm just to try to stop the cough so they can sleep. With vicks vaporub on their chest. They were still in coughing fits 1-2 hours later. I added some of this oil to their chest and put some in a diffuser in their bedrooms, and this has been the only thing that seems to work with their coughing.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Works really well in a diffuser during migraine
customer_reviews.text: I add a few drops in water and use in diffuser. It’s amazing. Works really well with my migraines. I thought the smell might be too much, but it’s actually for calming and pleasant. There is a slight cinnamon or spicy type smell (which usually triggers my migraines) that actually is very soft and soothing. Would definitely recommend to other headache and migraine sufferers.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Really works no gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Really does take away headache, and touching finger to top and inverting gives you a lot to apply. Several of coworkers and friends have used. Opens sinuses great too!
customer_reviews.author: Domineaux

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed by this product as I have a bottle from ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed by this product as I have a bottle from a few years ago that I just finished and loved so much, but this new bottle did not smell good. I am not sure if they have changed their supplier, if this bottle was a miss, or if they have changed their formula but I was so sad as this used to be my favorite oil to relax with. Ended up returning it :(
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend suffers from horrible migraines and this product helps to relieve some of ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend suffers from horrible migraines and this product helps to relieve some of the tension and help him relax. He prefers to use it in the diffuser, but it also works to just smell it directly from the bottle or even place a drop or two on your hands or temples. The smell is very pleasant and does not affect my asthma. Will definitely buy again. Going for the bigger bottle this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Willis

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Okay finally!!! I purchased something on Amazon that worked well enough for a repeat order. This stuff really worked for me. I usually take one advil then dap a little of this on my temple and within about 15 minutes Headache Is Gone!! If just take an Advil it might be 2 hours before relief and that's taking 2 Advil at that. If I take it this medicine by itself, the pain goes away but usually returns. That's why I use them together. May not be the same for everyone else but this is my review. Conclusion, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: roceller mosby

customer_reviews.title: It is a great scent! I had a migraine headache (common for ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great scent! I had a migraine headache (common for me) and usually sleeping it off works. I woke up from a short nap with no relief to find the Head Ease oil had been delivered and so I put it in my diffuser. When I woke up from my 2nd nap, I felt much better. The only reason I am not giving 5 stars is because I feel the fragrance does not last very long in my ultrasonic diffuser. Other than that, great product, will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware no stopper inside!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, it doesn’t have one of those stoppers inside. I used it in my diffuser with water and poured half the bottle in the first time. What a waste, I wish I realized, all of my other oils have them. My fault but still sad, so I can’t speak to it’s effectiveness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont buy, oil smell is OP!
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to help with migraine relief, right? This pos made mine WORSE! I gave it three tries, each time, same thing. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Alexiea

customer_reviews.title: From a migraine sufferers perspective
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd bottle of Head Ease ive purchased. I initially received this scent as part of a Christmas gift with a diffuser. I get migraines often, depending on many variables anywhere from 1-5 per week. I struggle to find relief when I have them, but this essential oil blend definitely helps. It smells good and helps alleviate some of the pain from my migraines. This is not a cure, I won’t pretend it is, but it helps reduce the pain slightly and makes it more manageable. Definitely recommend giving it a try. I use it in a diffuser next to my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast relief
customer_reviews.text: I seldom have migraines, but frequent headaches. Never tried oils before & am very pleased with the results, even with the painful eye socket variety. Good product, reasonably priced. Will buy larger bottle next time, but 10 ML does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad lingering smell
customer_reviews.text: This scent isn't so bad when it's coming out of my essential oil diffuser, however the smell lingers on fabric and it smells like stale toothpaste. Like what I would imagine the toothpaste that falls off of a toothbrush and sticks to the side of a sink smells like. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: HWeathers

customer_reviews.title: Headaches bye 👋
customer_reviews.text: Smell is amazing! Makes me relax instantly, I have bad tension headaches and this brings me so much relief.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: My lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing the head-ease oil for over a year. It's my lifesaver. Since starting to use it at the first sign of tension in my head and neck, I've been able to stop taking daily prescription migraine medication. Honestly, I rub this anywhere where I'm experiencing pain and, more often than not, the pain subsides. Before I run, I use it on my neck to keep me feeling cool and comfortable. I swear by this product (and I'm not one of those "essential oils are the cure for everything" weirdos. Never before have I written am Amazon review, but i love this oil and never go anywhere without it!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Very Helpful! I purchased this after my co-worker introduced me to the "Young Living" version. Since YL is out of my price range I took a chance on this highly rated blend. I made candles with it, and I purchased a roller ball applicator to carry with me in my purse! I am looking forward to try other blends from this company. They seem to work as promised as a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: L. White

customer_reviews.title: Okay stuff
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant enough smell. Seems to work as a counter-irritant for a mild headache.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help!
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and have been getting almost daily headaches. I have been trying to avoid taking Tylenol so I’d hoped oils might help. I put this in a diffuser at work and my headache either is less severe or non existent. I also get tension headaches in my neck so I mixed this with jojoba oil in a rollerball and apply as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been experiencing fierce headaches for over two months. No OTC pills worked and lying down made it worse. A friend told be to try essential oils and when I found this blend, I knew it was for me. Straight out of the box, it went right on my temples where it was tingling and felt like someone was massaging me. I felt an instant relief. Of course not 100% but it helped a great deal. My son said I smell like a candy cane and that's okay by me!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L Gold

customer_reviews.title: Must have to beat headaches
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using Advil for my headaches after I started using the oil. I was never a believer of essential oils before now I am. On the temples and back of the neck as you are getting the headaches would totally take care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Indira K.

customer_reviews.title: My wife has tmj and uses this more than the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife has tmj and uses this more than the hydrocodone they prescribed her. This stuff is a life saver for her. It definitely improves her quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: O.B.1

customer_reviews.title: I love oils but this one burnt.
customer_reviews.text: I use oils with a carrier oil but this one burnt my daughters forehead.
customer_reviews.author: D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Migraine sufferers rejoice
customer_reviews.text: Love this. If you're a migraine sufferer, this won't stop a migraine (because we all know it has to run it's course), but it definitely helps you relax!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Not gonna save you from migraines
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try when I get migraines, because I honestly hate taking pain killers for them. It’s decent but it definitely doesn’t get rid of the pain. The cooling effect is nice though!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great for tension headaches
customer_reviews.text: I am a constant sufferer of tension headaches. I love this blend. I used it for a roll on that I apply to my neck and hairline when I feel a headache starting. I like to mix this with the good sleep blend in my diffusser at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda lg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This blend is fantastic! It works great in providing comfort when I have migraines. I use it both as a rub ( always dilute with a carrier oil) and as a defused oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops my Migraine from Happening
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I feel the early twinges of a Migraine I put some of the Head Relief Blend into a diffuser and lay down for 20 minutes or so. For the last five times this has averted a head pounder. I'm a happy person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works.
customer_reviews.text: I am an admitted skeptic. No UFO's, no "spiritual world", no nonsensical claims about "natural medicine". AND, I have no connection to the company. BUT...I tend to view this product as a miracle pain reliever. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reese

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. I have struggled with migraines most of my life. And haven’t found anything to really calm it down at least. This dose the job. When I feel one coming on I will just rub it on and sometimes the migraine doesn’t even come at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Fugazzotto

customer_reviews.title: Works great rubbing on temples during headache
customer_reviews.text: When my packaged arrived from Amazon, the seal was broke and half of the oil had leaked into the packaging. I contacted the company and they replied the same day stating they would send me a replacement. Excellent customer service and I really enjoy the smell.
customer_reviews.author: cvachelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great migraine relief
customer_reviews.text: This blend of essential oils works great when applied topically to help ease my migraines. It smells nice and works effectively in a natural way.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Yow

customer_reviews.title: Something that really works.
customer_reviews.text: Great essential oil blend that actually works. Definitely worth trying, It's very strong blend so you have to dilute it before using. Great customer service, my bottle came broken and they replaced with one day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Magie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works for migraines and headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in candle making and got wonderful reviews from friends I have gifted it to! Reminds me of a lotion that Origins used to do about a decade ago, really lovely scent. Make sure to be careful around kitties because many of the ingredients may not be good for them in an essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Anntoinette Laskey

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my head clear
customer_reviews.text: Larger bottle choice would be nice. It does last a month though. Keeps my head clear with my cpap.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lee Kufeldt

customer_reviews.title: I don't particularly like the smell but it definitely helps my headache go ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't particularly like the smell but it definitely helps my headache go away. 10/10 recommended from a chronic migraine sufferer
customer_reviews.author: B. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My headaches come on quick and meds take a while to work. This has been a lifesaver to help in that in between. Also great to sit back and destress. Will definitely order again. PLUS a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works to alleviate headaches!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with the headaches! And much cheaper than buying all the separate oils to create my own blend. So glad I found this and decided to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Hbeanie824

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinus and pressure headaches
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines when the weather shifts and during seasonal allergy shifts and this oil helped ease my sleep and keep me asleep when I put it in the diffuser. Rubbing it on your temples and brow eases the pain as well. I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. I put it in a roller bottle with grape seed oil to use for my migraines and love it. I can smell and feel it working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Past tense seems much stronger and has a nice tingle when applied to the back of my neck
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after using DoTerra Past tense and I'm not digging it. Past tense seems much stronger and has a nice tingle when applied to the back of my neck , forehead and temples. This stuff..... NOTHING! Maybe I got a watered down version?? It seems thicker than my past tense yet in description says to dilute it??? Seems like it's already diluted with something ...will not purchase again... Maybe I'll just diffuse it instead since I do like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for headaches!
customer_reviews.text: This essential oil works wonders for headaches! It’s soothing, & definitely works! The smell is pleasant too.
customer_reviews.author: Jayjo

customer_reviews.title: From Skeptic to Fan
customer_reviews.text: Tried every kind of headache/migraine relief but a few drops to the temple or in a diffuser makes headaches go away in minutes. Would recommend to anyone who has regular headaches
customer_reviews.author: David Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines and anxiety and this product is very helpful. I don't use it instead of oral medication but in addition and it really helps. I also find the smell invigorating and soothing.
customer_reviews.author: MaryG

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible and nothing listed for types of oils used on bottle
customer_reviews.text: This oil doesn't help with my headaches at all. I am a frequent sufferer of migraine headaches that are often accompanied with vision and smell issues. This stuff makes me nauseous from the smell, and forget trying to find out what oils are used for this blend- they're not listed on the bottle anywhere. Guess I'll know next time to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Getoutdoors1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I rub a little under my hairline and onto my neck- and my headache vanishes. I’m also a massage therapist and use this on my clients with migraines.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blend that really does help when you have a headache. I've actually been also using it in my diffuser overnight, on my nightstand. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Headache Oil Yet
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best blend for headaches I have found!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Nicely scented oil
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Nice scent. Not too overpowering, but a good blend, and I love the wintergreen. This didn't cure my son's migraines (which I wasn't really expecting, but there are plenty of EO fans who promise this), but it is nice and relaxing to use anyway! We've used it on the skin with coconut oil, and also used it in body butters. It's nice!
customer_reviews.author: K. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Carry this everywhere
customer_reviews.text: As the headline says, I carry this stuff everywhere. I get headaches and migraines frequently. If I feel one coming on I just roll a little on my neck or temples and it takes the hurt away. Smells really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love the sent, works for mild headaches, and I use this more then the breath ones for my kids when they get sick way less minty
customer_reviews.author: Keelie Goin

customer_reviews.title: Works on my headaches
customer_reviews.text: This oil has a pleasant scent and does seem to improve my tough to treat headaches. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Swiger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Thus ya my second purchase, so strong it help my TMJ, I will definitely recommend this product thank you so much!!❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Great it works
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband works great . I had to get me another bottle because I gave the first one to my son because he had an headache it worked
customer_reviews.author: sandra c McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have a horrible I mean HORRIBLE toothache that has given me a headache so bad that i was crying and hard to manage. I use the side of my head where the pain is located and I am able to get some decent sleep because this stuff works. I will be using this until u get my tooth pulled next week. This also works for allergy synus problems
customer_reviews.author: aahyonna

customer_reviews.title: Migraine Gone Oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this blend oil. Its wonderful for migraine. Takes about 15 mins. feel migraines go away completely. Family favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great scent but peppermint/wintergreen is most prominent
customer_reviews.text: Husband really likes this. Use it at night in the diffuser next to the bed. A bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: SizeKingTx

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as I expected. I'm very satisfied and I will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: This blend is great. I keep a bottle at work for my headaches and word has gotten out how well it works and my coworkers borrow my bottle frequently..
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged!!
customer_reviews.text: 2 of 5 Healing Solution orders that I have placed have come in a plastic bottle with a metal safety seal on top. Prior orders were received in a glass amber bottle with a dropper orifice and a safety seal cap. Very disappointed! Healing Solutions has been my go to essential oil brand for some time but if this is the new packaging, NO THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Works everytime!
customer_reviews.text: Usually order in the set but this runs out first. Good size!
customer_reviews.author: ceomom

customer_reviews.title: Such a good blend
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and absolutely love it! It has helped me with headaches/migraines that I get frequently, and has saved me from awful smells when I'm cleaning for one of my clients that has dogs inside full time. I'm addicted to essential oils and this is one of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blend for head aches & pain
customer_reviews.text: Love to use this blend. I dilute 10 drops in a roller Bottle wIt’s coconut oil and keep it in my handbag.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Boykin

customer_reviews.title: get essential oil
customer_reviews.text: One of my new fav brands. The scent is true & potent. Really works well in a defuser or pulse points for relief
customer_reviews.author: campingirl

customer_reviews.title: Have purchased this several times
customer_reviews.text: My favorite blend; this helps me tremendously this flu season. It helps relieve headaches and congestion when I use it in my mister.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Puissegur

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Acetone!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this oil in the gift set, but the second time I bought it separately- something was way off!!! It smelled like acetone and even made my eyes and nostrils burn just at the slight brief sniff of it!!! I’ve tried it several different times thinking maybe my sense of smell was off, but NO something is definitely wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sameer M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Headaches
customer_reviews.text: Love this blend for headaches, however, I was a bit annoyed that the oil did not fill up the bottle (just surpassed the label). Not sure if some was lost during shipping or if this is just the way it comes. Nevertheless, overall this oil blend is totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent combination from this company. It is minty and fresh smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: With a migraine i used it in the shower for ...
customer_reviews.text: With a migraine i used it in the shower for sinus headaches i use my defuser and it stopped my headaches in less than 5 mins
customer_reviews.author: K Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well to take the edge off of my intense sinus migraines, and sometimes dispels the pain entirely.
customer_reviews.author: TamScamp

customer_reviews.title: This is a family favorite and staple for diffusing
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite blend. Although I would buy in the value combined pack for more savings bc all the blends are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark&Morgan

customer_reviews.title: uhhh cool
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for my stepmom, and she fell in love with it. it really seems to soothe her when she gets stress headaches!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Update ...
customer_reviews.text: I truly enjoyed the first time that I bought this E.Oil. The first time I ordered the 10 ml bottle and decided to buy the 30ml bottle the second time. I am so disappointed that the formula is not made with the same quantity per ingredient formula. Bottle is poor quality and half of it was empty ! 😭
customer_reviews.author: Maria W.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as advertised. For minor headaches to migraines. I will forever have this item in my house!!!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Order this every month on my subscribe and save. Helps my headaches immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Missy G

customer_reviews.title: Headaches & sore muscles/joints
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a muscle relaxer - & it works!
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: My saving grace
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. Very relaxing and very helpful when I have a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Headache gone!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on headaches. I subscribe to dōterra but this works better than pas tense on my headaches!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines, tension & sinus/allergy headaches. I have tried many different brands, companies, etc...this one is by far, the best one for me!! I HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Cochran

customer_reviews.title: I am trying to find a better pain management regimen than just pain medication and NSAIDS
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to find a better pain management regimen than just pain medication and NSAIDS. I purchased this and have been so happy with the results. I have let friends that suffer from migraines borrow this and they have also been impressed with the quick results. I highly recommend this to anyone who frequently suffers from mild to moderate head aches.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Engels

customer_reviews.title: good oil
customer_reviews.text: We use this at night in our diffuser. Seems to help with our sinus problems, my husbands snoring. I prefer the Breath blend better.
customer_reviews.author: 6192C

product_meta.title: Head Relief Blend Essential Oil - 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Head Relief Blend Oil - 10ml
product_meta.description:
Size:0.34 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Healing Solutions 100% Pure Essential oils are bottled in UV blocking amber essential oil bottles. 

Our Chief Scientist tests every batch of oil for purity in our in-house, state of art GC-MS Laboratory. This ensures every product sold is 100% pure essential oil! 

The Leading Aromatherapy Associations (Alliance of International Aromatherapists (AIA), International Aromatherapy and Aromatic Medicine Association, Aromatherapy Trade Council, and others) all state that essential oils should not be taken internally (regardless of purity or organic origin) unless under the guidance of a health care practitioner trained at an appropriate level . As such, all of our oils carry a label warning that the product is NOT FOR INTERNAL USE. 

What sets Healing Solutions Essential Oils apart is superior cultivation of ingredients that are the best in the world. Combined with superior distillation and bottling care process, We GUARANTEE that our oils are aromatically superior and more effective than any other oils - if you disagree we will refund your money!
feature_bullets: The most UNIQUE and AMAZING SMELLING Head Relief Blend on the market, in our opinion. If you are not ABSOLUTELY amazed, receive a full refund from the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, no questions asked!

SUPERIOR EXPERIENCE: If you are just trying our Head Relief Blend for the first time and you do not switch to it permanently as your new favorite oil the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, will refund your money, guaranteed.

PURE + RIGOROUS QUALITY TESTING & CONTROLS: Distillation facility is GMP, ISO 9001 and Kosher certified. Make sure ALL oils you buy have these qualifications * CHECK OUT OUR REVIEWS!! * In our opinion our oil is superior to organic and THE MOST RARE, BEST SMELLING, AND MOST THERAPEUTICALLY EFFECTIVE OF ALL Head Relief Blend (Blend)
Healing Solutions is SUPERIOR because it offers over 170 different oils for blending/pairing.
